## Other estimand working groups

- [Oncology estimand working group](http://www.oncoestimand.org).
- [EFSPI/PSI SIG on Estimands in Neuroscience](https://www.efspi.org/EFSPI/Special_Interest_Groups/Neuroscience_biostatistics_community.aspx).
- [International Society for Quality of Life Research (ISOQOL) statistics SIG](https://www.isoqol.org/sigs/#statistics): this SIG also has a workstream that works on estimands for PRO.
